monogr.author: Aeschylus
monogr.title: Aeschylus, with an English translation by Herbert Weir Smyth, Ph. D. in two volumes. 1.Prometheus

imprint.publisher: Cambridge, Mass., Harvard University Press; London, William Heinemann, Ltd.

respStmt.name: EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis

change.item: Text scanned at U. Chicago in 1988. Basic SGML tagging by EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis.
Final check of cardbreaks, tags, and linenumbers.
Compare with TLG text for missing words or other scanner omissions.
Fixed card breaks at 113, 127, 144, 342 and 906 and added 128b, 130b, 143b, 343b, and 906b for lines miscounted in the Loeb edition.

$Log: aesch.pb_gk.xml,v $
Revision 1.1  2009-10-09 19:49:17  rsingh04
more reorganizing of texts module by collection

Revision 1.1  2009/10/07 20:59:53  rsingh04
began reorganizing texts module by collection.  created separate work directory in texts module to keep hopper files separate from in progress files

Revision 1.3  2005/08/01 15:44:56  packel
really removed item tags

Revision 1.2  2005/08/01 15:32:41  packel
removed stray item tags

Revision 1.1  2005/07/25 14:27:14  packel
Converted to XML

Revision 1.10  2004/04/21 20:28:10  mimno
added card 1s

Revision 1.9  2003/07/01 22:14:25  yorkc
Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)

Revision 1.8  2000/03/15 17:03:56  amahoney
make sure cardbreaks never come before the end of a speech with an n
attribute -- this repeats the speaker name

Revision 1.7  2000/03/06 20:05:31  amahoney
fix headers for TOC

Revision 1.6  2000/03/04 20:33:49  dasmith
Added separate funder entity to TEI header.

Revision 1.5  2000/02/17 17:46:03  amahoney
use n on sp for speeches interrupted by cardbreaks;  put cards at ends of
such speeches after the close tag;  put sp and speaker tags on the divs
of the choruses, which were not marked at all (but div2 closes sp, so
we lost the speaker info)

Revision 1.4  1999/12/23 18:19:40  amahoney
convert to P3

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
l: a(/s soi path\r e)fei=to, to/nde pro\s pe/trais
to\ so\n ga\r a)/nqos, pante/xnou puro\s se/las,
a(marti/as sfe dei= qeoi=s dou=nai di/khn,

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
l: e)/xei te/los dh\ kou)de\n e)mpodw\n e)/ti:
e)gw\ d' a)/tolmo/s ei)mi suggenh= qeo\n
pa/ntws d' a)na/gkh tw=nde/ moi to/lman sxeqei=n:
i(/n' ou)/te fwnh\n ou)/te tou morfh\n brotw=n
o)/yei, staqeuto\s d' h(li/ou foi/bh| flogi\
xroia=s a)mei/yeis a)/nqos. a)sme/nw| de/ soi

l.#text: pa/xnhn q'  e(w/|an h(/lios skeda=| pa/lin:

l: a)ei\  de\ tou= paro/ntos a)xqhdw\n kakou=
tru/sei s': o( lwfh/swn ga\r ou) pe/fuke/ pw.
qeo\s qew=n ga\r ou)x u(popth/sswn xo/lon
a)nq' w(=n a)terph= th/nde frourh/seis pe/tran
pollou\s d' o)durmou\s kai\ go/ous a)nwfelei=s

l.#text: a(/pas de\ traxu\s o(/stis a)\n ne/on krath=|.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
l: ei)=en, ti/ me/lleis kai\ katoikti/zh|  ma/thn;
ti/ to\n qeoi=s e)/xqiston ou) stugei=s qeo/n,
o(/stis to\ so\n qnhtoi=si prou)/dwken ge/ras;

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.l: to\ suggene/s toi deino\n h(/ q' o(mili/a.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos

l.#text: su/mfhm': a)nhkoustei=n de\ tw=n patro\s lo/gwn

l: oi(=o/n te pw=s; ou) tou=to deimai/neis ple/on;

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.l: ai)ei/ ge  dh\ nhlh\s su\ kai\ qra/sous ple/ws.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
l: a)/kos ga\r ou)de\n to/nde qrhnei=sqai. su\ de\
ta\ mhde\n w)felou=nta mh\ po/nei ma/thn.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
l: ti/ nin stugei=s; po/nwn ga\r w(s a(plw=| lo/gw|
tw=n nu=n paro/ntwn ou)de\n ai)ti/a te/xnh.

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.l: e)/mpas tis au)th\n a)/llos w)/felen laxei=n.

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.l: e)/gnwka toi=sde kou)de\n a)nteipei=n e)/xw.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
l: w(s mh/ s' e)linu/onta prosderxqh=| path/r;

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.l: kai\ dh\ pro/xeira ya/lia  de/rkesqai pa/ra.

l.#text: balw/n  nin a)mfi\ xersi\n e)gkratei= sqe/nei

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.l: perai/netai dh\ kou) mata=| tou)/rgon to/de.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
l: deino\s ga\r eu(rei=n ka)c a)mhxa/nwn po/ron.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
l: kai\ th/nde nu=n po/rpason a)sfalw=s, i(/na

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.l: plh\n tou=d' a)\n ou)dei\s e)ndi/kws me/myaito/ moi.

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.l: ai)ai=, *promhqeu=, sw=n u(perste/nw  po/nwn.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
l: su\ d' au)= katoknei=s tw=n *dio/s t' e)xqrw=n u(/per
ste/neis; o(/pws mh\ sauto\n oi)ktiei=s pote.

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.l: o(ra=|s qe/ama dusqe/aton o)/mmasin.

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.l: dra=n tau=t' a)na/gkh, mhde\n e)gke/leu' a)/gan.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
l: h)= mh\n keleu/sw ka)piqwu/cw ge pro/s.
xw/rei ka/tw, ske/lh de\ ki/rkwson bi/a|.

l.#text: kai\ dh\ pe/praktai tou)/rgon ou) makrw=|  po/nw|.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
l: w(s ou(pitimhth/s ge  tw=n e)/rgwn baru/s.

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.l: o(/moia morfh=| glw=ssa/ sou ghru/etai.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
l: su\ malqaki/zou, th\n d' e)mh\n au)qadi/an

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.l: stei/xwmen, w(s kw/loisin a)mfi/blhstr' e)/xei.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
l: e)ntau=qa nu=n u(/brize kai\ qew=n ge/ra
oi(=oi/ te qnhtoi\ tw=nd' a)pantlh=sai po/nwn;
kalou=sin: au)to\n ga/r se dei= promhqe/ws,

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
l: w)= di=os  ai)qh\r kai\ taxu/pteroi pnoai/,
potamw=n te phgai/, ponti/wn te kuma/twn
kai\ to\n pano/pthn ku/klon h(li/ou kalw=.
i)/desqe/ m' oi(=a pro\s qew=n pa/sxw qeo/s.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
l: feu= feu=, to\ paro\n to/ t' e)perxo/menon
skeqrw=s ta\ me/llont', ou)de/ moi potai/nion
ph=m' ou)de\n h(/cei.  th\n peprwme/nhn de\ xrh\
ai)=san fe/rein w(s r(a=|sta, gignw/skonq' o(/ti

l.#text: to\ th=s a)na/gkhs e)/st' a)dh/riton sqe/nos.

l: a)ll'  ou)/te siga=n ou)/te mh\ siga=n tu/xas
oi(=o/n te/ moi ta/sd' e)sti/.  qnhtoi=s ga\r ge/ra
pa/shs brotoi=s pe/fhne kai\ me/gas po/ros.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s

l.#text: ti/s a)xw/, ti/s o)dma\ prose/pta m' a)feggh/s,

l: po/nwn e)mw=n  qewro/s, h)\ ti/ dh\ qe/lwn;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
l: feu= feu=, ti/ pot' au)= kina/qisma klu/w

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: d' e)/plhce/ mou ta\n qemerw=pin  ai)dw=:

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: ta\ pri\n de\ pelw/ria nu=n a)istoi=.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
l: ei) ga/r m' u(po\ gh=n ne/rqen q'  *(/aidou
w(s mh/te  qeo\s mh/te tis a)/llos
nu=n d' ai)qe/rion ki/nugm' o( ta/las

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: teoi=si, di/xa ge *dio/s; o( d' e)piko/tws a)ei\
ge/nnan, ou)de\ lh/cei, pri\n a)\n h)\ kore/sh| ke/ar h)\ pala/ma| tini\

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
l: h)= mh\n e)/t' e)mou=, kai/per kraterai=s
dei=cai to\ ne/on bou/leum' u(f'  o(/tou
pri\n a)\n e)c a)gri/wn desmw=n xala/sh|

sp.speaker: *xoro/s

l.#text: su\ me\n qrasu/s te kai\ pikrai=s

l: e)ma\s de\ fre/nas e)re/qise  dia/toros fo/bos:
sant' e)sidei=n: a)ki/xhta ga\r h)/qea kai\ ke/ar

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
l: oi)=d' o(/ti traxu\s kai\  par' e(autw=|

l.#text: to\ di/kaion e)/xwn *zeu/s. a)ll' e)/mpas  o)i/w

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: pa/nt' e)kka/luyon kai\ ge/gwn' h(mi=n lo/gon,
di/dacon h(ma=s, ei)/ ti mh\ bla/ptei lo/gw|.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
l: a)lgeina\ me/n moi kai\ le/gein e)sti\n ta/de,

l.#text: a)/lgos de\ siga=n, pantaxh=| de\ du/spotma.

l: w(s *zeu\s a)na/ssoi dh=qen, oi( de\ tou)/mpalin
e)ntau=q' e)gw\ ta\ lw=|sta bouleu/wn piqei=n

l.#text: w)/|ont'  a)moxqei\  pro\s bi/an te despo/sein:

l: e)moi\ de\ mh/thr ou)x a(/pac mo/non *qe/mis,
w(s ou) kat' i)sxu\n ou)de\ pro\s to\ kartero/n

l.#text: xrei/h, do/lw| de\ tou\s u(persxo/ntas  kratei=n.

l: ou)k h)ci/wsan ou)de\ prosble/yai to\ pa=n.
kra/tista dh/ moi tw=n parestw/twn to/te
e)/nesti ga/r pws tou=to th=| turanni/di

l.#text: o(\ d' ou)=n e)rwta=t', ai)ti/an kaq' h(/ntina
o(/pws ta/xista to\n patrw=|on e)s qro/non

l: a)rxh/n: brotw=n de\ tw=n talaipw/rwn lo/gon
ou)k e)/sxen ou)de/n', a)ll' a)istw/sas ge/nos

l.#text: to\ pa=n e)/xrh|zen a)/llo fitu=sai ne/on.

l: kai\ toi=sin  ou)dei\s a)nte/baine plh\n e)mou=.

l.#text: pa/sxein me\n a)lgeinai=sin, oi)ktrai=sin d' i)dei=n:

l: qnhtou\s d' e)n oi)/ktw| proqe/menos, tou/tou tuxei=n

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: mo/xqois: e)gw\ ga\r ou)/t' a)\n ei)sidei=n ta/de

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.l: kai\ mh\n fi/lois <g' > e)leino\s  ei)sora=n e)gw/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: mh/ pou/ ti prou/bhs tw=nde kai\ peraite/rw;

l.#text: qnhtou/s g'  e)/pausa mh\ prode/rkesqai  mo/ron.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: to\ poi=on eu(rw\n th=sde fa/rmakon no/sou;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.l: tufla\s e)n au)toi=s e)lpi/das katw/|kisa.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: me/g' w)fe/lhma  tou=t' e)dwrh/sw brotoi=s.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.l: pro\s toi=sde me/ntoi pu=r e)gw/ sfin w)/pasa.

l.#text: kai\ nu=n flogwpo\n pu=r e)/xous' e)fh/meroi;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.l: a)f' ou(= ge polla\s e)kmaqh/sontai te/xnas.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: toioi=sde dh/ se *zeu\s e)p' ai)tia/masin

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.l: ai)ki/zetai/ te kou)damh=| xala=| kakw=n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ou)d' e)/stin a)/qlou te/rma soi prokei/menon;

l.#text: ou)k a)/llo g' ou)de/n, plh\n o(/tan kei/nw| dokh=|.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: do/cei de\ pw=s; ti/s e)lpi/s; ou)x o(ra=|s o(/ti
h(/martes; w(s d' h(/martes ou)/t' e)moi\ le/gein
kaq' h(donh\n soi/ t' a)/lgos.  a)lla\ tau=ta me\n
meqw=men, a)/qlou d' e)/klusin zh/tei tina/.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
l: e)/xei parainei=n nouqetei=n te to\n kakw=s
pra/ssont':  e)gw\ de\ tau=q' a(/pant' h)pista/mhn.

l.#text: ou) mh/n ti poinai=s g' w)|o/mhn toi/aisi/ me

l: kai/ moi ta\ me\n paro/nta mh\ du/resq' a)/xh,
pe/doi de\ ba=sai ta\s proserpou/sas tu/xas

l.#text: a)kou/saq', w(s ma/qhte dia\ te/lous to\ pa=n.

l: tw=| nu=n mogou=nti.  tau)ta/ toi  planwme/nh

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: xqoni\ th=|de pelw=, tou\s sou\s de\ po/nous

sp.speaker: *)wkeano/s

l.#text: tai=s sai=s de\ tu/xais, i)/sqi, sunalgw=.

l: to\ te ga/r me, dokw=, suggene\s ou(/tws
xwri/s te ge/nous ou)k e)/stin o(/tw|

l.#text: gnw/sh| de\ ta/d' w(s e)/tum', ou)de\ ma/thn

l: sh/main' o(/ ti xrh/ soi sumpra/ssein:

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s

l.#text: e)/a: ti/ xrh=ma leu/ssw;  kai\ su\ dh\ po/nwn e)mw=n

l: e)lqei=n e)s ai)=an; h)=  qewrh/swn tu/xas

sp.speaker: *)wkeano/s

l.#text: qe/lw ta\ lw=|sta, kai/per o)/nti poiki/lw|.

l: ne/ous: ne/os ga\r kai\ tu/rannos e)n qeoi=s.
ei) d' w(=de traxei=s kai\ teqhgme/nous lo/gous
r(i/yeis, ta/x' a)/n sou kai\ makra\n a)nwte/rw

l.#text: qakw=n klu/oi *zeu/s, w(/ste soi to\n nu=n o)/xlon

l: a)ll', w)= talai/pwr', a(\s e)/xeis o)rga\s a)/fes,
a)rxai=' i)/sws soi fai/nomai le/gein ta/de:
su\ d' ou)de/pw tapeino\s ou)d' ei)/keis kakoi=s,
pro\s toi=s parou=si d' a)/lla proslabei=n qe/leis.

l.#text: pro\s ke/ntra kw=lon e)ktenei=s, o(rw=n o(/ti

l: kai\ nu=n e)gw\ me\n ei)=mi kai\ peira/somai
e)a\n du/nwmai tw=nde/ s' e)klu=sai po/nwn.
su\ d' h(su/xaze mhd' a)/gan labrosto/mei.

l.#text: h)\ ou)k oi)=sq'  a)kribw=s w)\n perisso/frwn o(/ti

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
l: zhlw= s' o(qou/nek' e)kto\s ai)ti/as kurei=s
kai\ nu=n e)/ason mhde/  soi melhsa/tw.

l.#text: pa/ntws ga\r ou) pei/seis  nin: ou) ga\r eu)piqh/s.

l: pa/ptaine d' au)to\s mh/ ti phmanqh=|s o(dw=|.

sp.speaker: *)wkeano/s
l: pollw=| g' a)mei/nwn tou\s pe/las frenou=n e)/fus
h)\ sauto/n: e)/rgw| kou) lo/gw| tekmai/romai.
au)xw= ga\r au)xw= th/nde dwrea\n e)moi\
dw/sein *di/', w(/ste tw=nde/ s' e)klu=sai po/nwn.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
l: ta\ me\n s' e)painw= kou)damh=|  lh/cw pote/:
mhde\n po/nei. ma/thn ga\r ou)de\n w)felw=n

l.#text: e)moi\ ponh/seis, ei)/ ti kai\ ponei=n qe/leis.

l: e)gw\ ga\r ou)k, ei) dustuxw=, tou=d' ei(/neka
qe/loim' a)\n w(s plei/stoisi phmona\s tuxei=n.
ou) dh=t' e)pei/ me kai\ kasignh/tou tu/xai
e(/sthke ki/on' ou)ranou= te kai\ xqono\s
e)c o)mma/twn d' h)/strapte gorgwpo\n se/las,
kompasma/twn.  fre/nas ga\r ei)s au)ta\s tupei\s

l.#text: kai\ nu=n a)xrei=on kai\ para/oron  de/mas

l: korufai=s d' e)n a)/krais h(/menos mudroktupei=

l.#text: su\ d'  ou)k a)/peiros, ou)d' e)mou= didaska/lou

l: e)gw\ de\ th\n parou=san a)ntlh/sw tu/xhn,

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
l: e)a/n tis e)n kairw=| ge malqa/ssh| ke/ar
kai\ mh\ sfrigw=nta qumo\n i)sxnai/nh| bi/a|.

sp.speaker: *)wkeano/s
l: e)n tw=| proqumei=sqai de\ kai\ tolma=n ti/na

sp.speaker: *)wkeano/s
l: e)/a me th=|de th=| no/sw| nosei=n, e)pei\
ke/rdiston eu)= fronou=nta mh\ fronei=n dokei=n.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.l: e)mo\n dokh/sei ta)mpla/khm' ei)=nai to/de.

sp.speaker: *)wkeano/s
sp.l: safw=s m' e)s oi)=kon so\s lo/gos ste/llei pa/lin.

l.#text: mh\ ga/r se qrh=nos ou(mo\s ei)s e)/xqran ba/lh|.

sp.speaker: *)wkeano/s
sp.l: h)= tw=| ne/on qakou=nti pagkratei=s e(/dras;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.l: tou/tou fula/ssou mh/ pot' a)xqesqh=| ke/ar.

sp.speaker: *)wkeano/s
sp.l: h( sh/, *promhqeu=, sumfora\ dida/skalos.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.l: ste/llou, komi/zou, sw=|ze to\n paro/nta nou=n.

sp.speaker: *)wkeano/s
l: leuro\n ga\r oi(=mon ai)qe/ros yai/rei pteroi=s

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: pro/pasa d' h)/dh stono/en le/lake xw/ra,

l.#text: mo/non dh\  pro/sqen a)/llon e)n po/nois

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
l: mh/ toi xlidh=| dokei=te mhd' au)qadi/a|
siga=n me: sunnoi/a| de\ da/ptomai ke/ar,
kai/toi qeoi=si toi=s ne/ois tou/tois ge/ra
a)ll' au)ta\ sigw=:  kai\ ga\r ei)dui/aisin a)\n
u(mi=n le/goimi: ta)n brotoi=s de\ ph/mata
a)kou/saq', w(/s sfas nhpi/ous o)/ntas to\ pri\n

l.#text: le/cw de/, me/myin ou)/tin'  a)nqrw/pois e)/xwn,
oi(\ prw=ta me\n ble/pontes e)/blepon ma/thn,

l: h)=n d' ou)de\n au)toi=s ou)/te xei/matos te/kmar
qe/rous be/baion, a)ll' a)/ter gnw/mhs to\ pa=n
e)/prasson, e)/ste dh/ sfin a)ntola\s e)gw\
a)/strwn e)/deica ta/s te duskri/tous du/seis.

l.#text: ge/noinq' , u(f' a(/rma t' h)/gagon filhni/ous

l: qalasso/plagkta  d' ou)/tis a)/llos a)nt' e)mou=

l.#text: brotoi=sin, au)to\s ou)k e)/xw so/fism' o(/tw|

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: plana=|, kako\s d' i)atro\s w(/s tis e)s no/son
pesw\n a)qumei=s kai\ seauto\n ou)k e)/xeis

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
l: ta\ loipa/ mou klu/ousa qauma/sh| ple/on,
oi(/as te/xnas te kai\ po/rous e)mhsa/mhn.
to\ me\n me/giston, ei)/ tis e)s  no/son pe/soi,
ou)k h)=n a)le/chm' ou)de/n, ou)/te  brw/simon,

l.#text: ou) xristo/n, ou)de\ pisto/n, a)lla\ farma/kwn

l: xrei/a| kateske/llonto, pri/n g' e)gw/ sfisin

l.#text: ka)/krina prw=tos e)c o)neira/twn a(\ xrh\

l: e)/xous' e(/kastoi, kai\ pro\s a)llh/lous ti/nes
e)/xqrai te kai\ ste/rghqra kai\ sunedri/ai:
spla/gxnwn te leio/thta, kai\ xroia\n ti/na
e)/xous'  a)\n ei)/h dai/mosin pro\s h(donh\n
kni/sh| te kw=la sugkalupta\ kai\ makra\n

l.#text: toiau=ta me\n dh\ tau=t': e)/nerqe de\ xqono\s

l: xalko/n, si/dhron,  a)/rguron, xruso/n te ti/s

o(/pws d' a)\n ei)dh=| mh\ ma/thn klu/ousa/ mou,

l.#text: a(\ pri\n molei=n deu=r'  e)kmemo/xqhken fra/sw,

l.#text: o)/xlon me\n ou)=n to\n plei=ston e)klei/yw lo/gwn,

te/ras t' a)/piston, ai( prosh/goroi dru/es,
u(f' w(=n su\ lamprw=s kou)de\n ai)nikthri/ws

l.#text: me/llous' e)/sesqai. tw=nde prossai/nei se/ ti ;

th=s sh=s porei/as mnh=ma toi=s pa=sin brotoi=s.

l.#text: shmei=a/ soi ta/d' e)sti\ th=s e)mh=s freno/s,

l: w(s de/rketai ple/on ti tou= pefasme/nou.
ta\ loipa\ d' u(mi=n th=|de/ t' e)s koino\n fra/sw,

l.#text: e)s tau)to\n e)lqw\n tw=n pa/lai lo/gwn i)/xnos.

l: e)pafw=n a)tarbei= xeiri\ kai\ qigw\n mo/non.
pe/mpth d' a)p' au)tou= ge/nna penthkonta/pais

gunh\ ga\r a)/ndr' e(/kaston ai)w=nos sterei=,

sp.speaker: *xoro/s

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: e)moi\ d'  o(/te   me\n o(malo\s o( ga/mos,
a)/fobos: ou) de/dia:  mhde\ kreisso/nwn qew=n
a)po/lemos o(/de g' o( po/lemos, a)/pora po/rimos:

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s

l.#text: qro/nwn t'  a)/iston e)kbalei=: patro\s d'  a)ra\

l.#text: e)gw\ ta/d'  oi)=da xw)=| tro/pw|.  pro\s tau=ta/ nun

l: se/bou, proseu/xou, qw=pte  to\n kratou=nt' a)ei/.
e)moi\ d' e)/lasson *zhno\s h)\ mhde\n me/lei.
dra/tw, kratei/tw to/nde to\n braxu\n xro/non,

l.#text: o(/pws qe/lei: daro\n ga\r ou)k a)/rcei qeoi=s.

to\n tou= tura/nnou tou= ne/ou dia/konon:

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s

poro/nta tima/s, to\n puro\s kle/pthn le/gw:

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s

l.#text: ne/on ne/oi kratei=te kai\ dokei=te dh\

tri/ton de\ to\n nu=n koiranou=nt' e)po/yomai
ai)/sxista kai\ ta/xista.  mh/ ti/ soi dokw=

peu/sh| ga\r ou)de\n w(=n a)nistorei=s e)me/.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
l: th=s sh=s latrei/as th\n e)mh\n duspraci/an,
safw=s e)pi/stas', ou)k a)\n a)lla/caim' e)gw/.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
l: krei=sson ga\r oi)=mai th=|de latreu/ein pe/tra|

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.l: xlida=n e)/oikas toi=s parou=si pra/gmasi.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
l: xlidw=; xlidw=ntas w(=de tou\s e)mou\s e)gw\
e)xqrou\s i)/doimi: kai\ se\ d' e)n tou/tois le/gw.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.l: h)= ka)me\ ga/r ti sumforai=s e)paitia=|;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s

l.#text: a(plw=| lo/gw| tou\s pa/ntas e)xqai/rw qeou/s,

l: o(/soi paqo/ntes eu)= kakou=si/ m' e)kdi/kws.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.l: klu/w s' e)gw\ memhno/t' ou) smikra\n  no/son.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.l: nosoi=m' a)/n, ei) no/shma tou\s e)xqrou\s stugei=n.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.l: ei)/hs forhto\s ou)k a)/n, ei) pra/ssois kalw=s.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.l: a)ll' e)kdida/skei pa/nq' o( ghra/skwn xro/nos.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.l: kai\ mh\n su/ g' ou)/pw swfronei=n e)pi/stasai.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.l: se\ ga\r proshu/dwn ou)k a)\n o)/nq' u(phre/thn.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.l: e)rei=n e)/oikas ou)de\n w(=n xrh/|zei path/r.

l.#text: kai\ mh\n o)fei/lwn g' a)\n ti/noim'  au)tw=| xa/rin.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.l: e)kerto/mhsas dh=qen w(s pai=d' o)/nta me.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
l: ou) ga\r su\ pai=s te ka)/ti tou=d' a)nou/steros
ei) prosdoka=|s e)mou= ti peu/sesqai  pa/ra;
ou)k e)/stin ai)/kism' ou)de\ mhxa/nhm' o(/tw|
pro\s tau=ta r(ipte/sqw me\n ai)qalou=ssa  flo/c,

l.#text: gna/myei  ga\r ou)de\n tw=nde/ m' w(/ste kai\ fra/sai

l: pro\s ou(= xrew/n nin e)kpesei=n turanni/dos.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.l: o(/ra nun  ei)/ soi tau=t' a)rwga\ fai/netai.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.l: w)=ptai  pa/lai dh\ kai\ bebou/leutai ta/de.

l.#text: pro\s ta\s parou/sas phmona\s o)rqw=s fronei=n,

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
l: o)xlei=s ma/thn me ku=m' o(/pws parhgorw=n.
lu=sai/ me desmw=n tw=nde: tou= panto\s de/w.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
l: le/gwn e)/oika polla\ kai\ ma/thn e)rei=n:
te/ggh| ga\r ou)de\n ou)de\ malqa/ssh| litai=s
e)mai=s: dakw\n de\ sto/mion w(s neozugh\s

l.#text: pw=los bia/zh| kai\ pro\s h(ni/as ma/xh|.

l: au)qadi/a ga\r tw=| fronou=nti mh\ kalw=s
au)th\ kaq' au(th\n ou)deno\s mei=zon sqe/nei.
ske/yai d', e)a\n mh\ toi=s e)moi=s peisqh=|s lo/gois,

l.#text: oi(=o/s se xeimw\n kai\ kakw=n trikumi/a

l: e)/peis' a)/fuktos : prw=ta me\n ga\r o)kri/da
path\r spara/cei th/nde, kai\ kru/yei de/mas
to\ so/n, petrai/a d' a)gka/lh se basta/sei.
a)/yorron h(/ceis ei)s fa/os: *dio\s de/ toi/

l.#text: toiou=de mo/xqou te/rma mh/ ti  prosdo/ka,

l: pri\n a)\n qew=n tis dia/doxos tw=n sw=n po/nwn
fanh=|, qelh/sh| t' ei)s a)nau/ghton molei=n

l.#text: pro\s tau=ta bou/leu': w(s o(/d'  ou) peplasme/nos

l: o( ko/mpos, a)lla\ kai\ li/an ei)rhme/nos :
to\ *di=on, a)lla\ pa=n e)/pos telei=:  su\ de\

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: le/gein. a)/nwge ga/r se th\n au)qadi/an

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
l: pro\s tau=t'  e)p'  e)moi\ r(ipte/sqw  me\n
a)gri/wn a)ne/mwn: xqo/na d' e)k puqme/nwn

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
l: h( tou=d' eu)xh/; ti/ xala=| maniw=n;
a)ll' ou)=n u(mei=s g' ai(  phmosu/nais

l.#text: meta/ poi  xwrei=t'  e)k tw=nde qow=s,

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: a)/llo ti fw/nei kai\ paramuqou= m'
o(/ ti kai\ pei/seis: ou) ga\r dh/ pou
meta\ tou=d' o(/ ti xrh\ pa/sxein e)qe/lw:

l.#text: ph=m'  ei)se/balen: mh\ dh=t' au)tai\ d'

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
l: w)= mhtro\s e)mh=s se/bas, w)= pa/ntwn
